item.description:
Cruz Saubidet va a dar una charla sobre Argentina. Esto es el nueva fecha de la reunion que era para el 18 de Enero. Por favor nos pide que cada miembro trayer algun postre o algo para compartir con el grupo.

Cruz Saubidet will give a presentation about his native Argentina. This is the new date for the Meet Up that was postponed due to the weather on January 18th. As always we ask each member to bring a snack to share with the group.
item.how_to_find_us: The meet up will be in the meeting room in the rear of the library-There will also be signs

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Charla Sobre Argentina Por Cruz Saubidet
